title: Why do the people in the message boards always reflect the opposite opinion as the people in game?
body:
For instance...

Anyone here in the message boards would be satisfied with the Fiora rework.

Anyone in game who actually plays the game wants the old Fiora back. 

Watch I to prove my point I will cast a vote and you will see the bias:

replies.body: Stfu Bronzie

I am better than any LCS player on the old Fiora.  If I am bronze it is because of noobs like you banning me for any hair trigger animosity. 

Perhaps I was teaching you how to play the game better and you didn't like it because you are a know it all. Well that gets you an instant report. 

If you try to educate new players you will find yourself with a new account over and over again. 

Climbing the ladder only happens to people who have friends that are good players.

Maybe I'm a loner and bronze life is impossible no matter how good you are when someone is afking or feeding every game you play. 

Teamwork makes people advanced not working alone. 

Working alone only worked when I could split push with the old Fiora.

But Riot made sure no solo champ could be viable. 

Thus it is impossible without the old Fiora to climb solo. 

I figure on average 70% of the games have an AFKer.   Perhaps it is by chance they are always on my team. 

Perhaps Riot just nerfed my champ to be a jerk. 

Being a jerk is a violation of the summoners code. 

So I want either my champ back or better teamates.

No longer an ability to use a jungle item without smite.  Nerfing her amazing smiteless jungling. (Riot didn't even know about/ let alone care) She didn't require help with red because of it and that was great. Now only shako can still do that.
